ISSUE.TITLE: Project Schedules Related Tab
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY We'll need to support a few different things here: 1) The schedule list itself (should be able to re-use #4959 with a different endpoint) 2) Add schedule form (should be able to re-use #5864 with a different endpoint) 3) Edit schedule form (should be able to re-use #5865 with a different endpoint) 4) Schedule details view (should be able to re-use #5859 with a different endpoint) Going to mark this as blocked until #4959, #5859, #5864, and #5865 are done.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5878 from ansible/try-find-delete-4.2 [4.2.0] deleting folder contents using find command

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5888 from ansible/cherry-pick-Z change SELinux label for EE volume mount
